Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 55th/Western
ShortDescription: Eastbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 59th, Damen, and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 59th, Damen, and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Western.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 26th/Western
ShortDescription: Westbound 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Blue Island, Western, Cermak, California, and 26th, due to street blockage near 26th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Blue Island, Western, Cermak, California, and 26th, due to street blockage near 26th/Western.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
